author: cortze
content:
Hey there, I've been trying to upgrade Hermes (a Libp2p and GossipSub Tracer) to support Fulu, and I've been experiencing connectivity issues when testing the changes in Hoodi.

I've seen some Prysm nodes sending GoodBye messages with the error codes: `fault/error` and `client banned this node`, and some Lighthouse nodes sending `peer score too low`
After some debugging, the issue seems to be related to invalid messages being forwarded around. Please note that Hermes doesn't do any message validation at the GossipSub level, so we would also forward them back, but this also means that nodes originated them  

I've done some debugging at a local Prysm node, and I can see that there were indeed messages that failed the validation, which does indeed point towards the hypothesis I just mentioned.

Has anyone experienced similar levels of invalid messages or similar errors being reported?

I'm only aware of this Issue at Prysm -> https://github.com/OffchainLabs/prysm/issues/15952
